Italian oversized sew on snaps used for central closure

name: Circle coat
description:
"When putting a wardrobe together, if your budget is limited, the most important thing is having the discipline to invest in one or two beautiful key pieces and mixing these with classic pieces like the cashmere sweater, the great jeans, the perfect crisp white shirt. Plan your long-term wardrobe. Only buy pieces that you can't live without; don't be tempted by disposable"
Roland Mouret

FEATURES:
This versatile style 4 sew on snaps that allow you endlessly play with the draping collar;
Inside harness like yoke allows the jacket to stay in place and serves as a ventilation element, when you swing all draping back;
Snaps at the bottom to create interesting, cocoon silhouette;
The jacket also quite spectacularly drapes down when open or belted;
Oversized collar can be used as a hood ;
Impeccable seams finish and outstanding quality craftsmanship;

name: Turban hand knit
description:
TURBAN 
Fall/ winter knit fashion 70s 1970 Turban - one size fits all
I always loved to create versatile things, especially when you can adjust style from high fashion to casual. In the past couple of years turbans made their come back into fashion, but not everyone was ready to embrace style. That's why I come up with this clever solution for street fashion - reversible turban. 

One side has voluminous double knot (definitely a statement; you can also pull out ponytail through the knot, when it's positioned at the neck). The opposite side of the turban finished with flat crocheted, chakra like, diamond (yes - place it on the crown of your head to connect with the Universe!) 
FEATURES:

-Hand knit 100 % lambs wool turban/ hat  
-Can be worn 2 ways (big knot in front - for more architectural bold look or diamond in front  - for more casual flat shape)

name: Retro mini scarf
description:
Desperately Different designer Katya Revenko creates ‘round the neck knitwear that is luscious, head turning, and—most importantly—warm enough to get you through the winter. Handmade in Canada from 100% lambs wool, this collection of chunky  hand knits is made for snuggling without sacrificing even an ounce of style.

Let's face it—a good scarf is essential to keeping one warm in the colder months. Anyone can wear a killer outfit underneath their coat, but I've always felt that it's what you're wearing on top that has the most impact.

description:

The patent rope can be a separate belt, and you can wear wide part with any of your thin regular buckle belts.
